mapper.select: SELECT uc.user_id, SUM(c.coupon_quota) coupon_quota FROM ht_coupon_user uc LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_config c ON uc.coupon_code = c.coupon_code WHERE uc.end_time >= #{startTime} AND uc.end_time < #{endTime} AND c.coupon_type = 3 AND uc.used_flag = 0 AND uc.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY uc.user_id
